original_text: And he has told you lies about me. But you are like an angel of God. I know that you will do what you think is right.
korean_text: 종인 나를 내 주 왕께 모함하였나이다 내 주 왕께서는 하나님의 사자와 같으시니 왕의 처분대로 하옵소서

sentences.original_text: And he has told you lies about me
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나에 대해 거짓말을 당신에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: But you are like an angel of God
I know that you will do
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신이 할 것이라는 것을 압니다
